mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name FROM xx_area a WHERE a.parent = #{areaId} ORDER BY a.orders
SELECT p.`pic_seq` type, p.`link_url` linkUrl FROM uhoem_picture p WHERE p.pic_no = 5 AND p.pic_seq IN (3,4,5,6)
SELECT COUNT(m.id) FROM uhoem_messages m LEFT JOIN uhoem_message_status ms ON ms.message_id = m.id WHERE ms.`status`=1 and ms.memberid=#{memberid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM uhoem_news news WHERE news.is_enabled = 1 AND news.`id` NOT IN (SELECT ir.`news_id` FROM uhoem_news_isread ir WHERE ir.`member_id` = #{memberId})
